name: Acolyte of C'Thun

name: Agamaggan, the Great Boar

name: Amalgadon

text: Battlecry: Give your other Elementals +1/+1.

name: Bannerboar
text: At the end of your turn, play a Blood Gem on adjacent Quilboar.

name: Baron Rivendare

flavorText: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

name: Bigfernal
text: After you summon a Demon, gain +1/+1 permanently.

name: Bloodsail Cannoneer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Pirates +3 Attack.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood

name: Bonker

name: Brann Bronzebeard

name: Bristleback Brute
text: The first Blood Gem played on this each turn gives an extra +2/+2.

name: Bristleback Knight
text: Windfury, Divine Shield Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.

name: Bronze Warden
text: Divine Shield Reborn

name: Cap'n Hoggarr
text: After you buy a Pirate, gain 1 Gold this turn only.

name: Captain Flat Tusk

name: Cave Hydra
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavorText: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

name: Champion of Y'Shaarj
text: Whenever a friendly Taunt minion is attacked, gain +1/+1 permanently.

name: Charlga
text: At the end of your turn, play a Blood Gem on all other friendly minions.

name: Cobalt Scalebane
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavorText: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

name: Coldlight Seer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavorText: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Crackling Cyclone
text: Divine Shield Windfury

name: Crystalweaver
text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
flavorText: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

name: Deadly Spore
text: Poisonous

name: Deck Swabbie
text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of upgrading Bob's Tavern by (1).

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.

name: Deflect-o-Bot

name: Dragonspawn Lieutenant
text: Taunt

name: Drakonid Enforcer
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2/+2.

text: Whenever a friendly Pirate attacks, give all friendly minions +2/+1.

name: Dynamic Duo

name: Faceless Taverngoer

name: Felfin Navigator
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavorText: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Fiendish Servant

flavorText: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Foe Reaper 4000
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
flavorText: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

name: Freedealing Gambler
text: This minion sells for 3 Gold.

name: Gentle Djinni
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon another random Elemental and add a copy of it to your hand.

name: Ghastcoiler
text: Deathrattle: Summon 2 random Deathrattle minions.

name: Glyph Guardian
text: Whenever this attacks, double its Attack.

name: Goldgrubber
text: At the end of your turn, gain +2/+2 for each friendly Golden minion.

name: Goldrinn, the Great Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Give your Beasts +5/+5.

name: Groundshaker
text: After a Blood Gem is played on this, give your other minions +2 Attack for next combat only.

name: Hangry Dragon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +2/+2 if you won the last combat.

name: Harvest Golem

name: Herald of Flame
text: Overkill: Deal 3 damage to the left-most enemy minion.

name: Houndmaster

flavorText: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks. It's rhetorical.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.

name: Imp Mama
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a random Demon and give it Taunt.

name: Imprisoner
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Imp.

name: Infested Wolf

flavorText: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Iron Sensei
text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavorText: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language. 0110100001101001

name: Ironhide Direhorn
text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Ironhide Runt.
flavorText: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

name: Junkbot
text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

name: Kaboom Bot

name: Kalecgos, Arcane Aspect

name: Kangor's Apprentice
text: Deathrattle: Summon the first 2 friendly Mechs that died this combat.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.

name: Kindly Grandmother
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
flavorText: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."

name: King Bagurgle
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give your other Murlocs +2/+2.

name: Lieutenant Garr
text: Taunt. After you play an Elemental, gain +1 Health for each Elemental you have.

name: Lightfang Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give a friendly minion of each minion type +2/+2.

name: Maexxna

name: Majordomo Executus
text: At the end of your turn, give your left-most minion +1/+1. Repeat for each Elemental you played this turn.

name: Mal'Ganis

name: Mama Bear
text: Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +4/+4.

name: Metaltooth Leaper
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.

name: Micro Machine
text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.

name: Micro Mummy

name: Murloc Warleader

name: Murozond
text: Battlecry: Add a minion from your last opponent's warband to your hand.

text: Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +2 Attack.

name: Rat Pack

text: Battlecry: Gain a Blood Gem.

text: Start of Combat: Deal 1 damage per friendly Dragon to one random enemy minion.

text: Battlecry: Your next Refresh costs (0).

name: Ring Matron

name: Salty Looter

name: Savannah Highmane

name: Scallywag
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Pirate. It attacks immediately.

name: Scavenging Hyena

name: Screwjank Clunker

name: Sellemental

text: Battlecry: Add another random Elemental to your hand.

text: Whenever a friendly Dragon kills an enemy, gain +2/+2.
